member.name: M:OswLib.Campur.BCrypt.HashString(System.String)
member.summary: Hash a String using the OpenBSD bcrypt scheme and a salt generated by .

member.name: M:OswLib.Campur.BCrypt.HashString(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Hash a String using the OpenBSD bcrypt scheme and a salt generated by .
member.param: The log2 of the number of rounds of hashing to apply - the work factor therefore increases as 2^workFactor.

member.name: M:OswLib.Campur.BCrypt.HashPassword(System.String)
member.summary: Hash a password using the OpenBSD bcrypt scheme and a salt generated by .

member.name: M:OswLib.Campur.BCrypt.HashPassword(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Hash a password using the OpenBSD bcrypt scheme and a salt generated by using the given .
member.param: The log2 of the number of rounds of hashing to apply - the work factor therefore increases as 2^workFactor.

member.name: M:OswLib.Campur.BCrypt.HashPassword(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Hash a password using the OpenBSD bcrypt scheme.
member.exception: Thrown when one or more arguments have unsupported or illegal values.
member.param: the salt to hash with (perhaps generated using BCrypt.gensalt).

member.name: M:OswLib.Campur.BCrypt.GenerateSalt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generate a salt for use with the method.
member.param: The log2 of the number of rounds of hashing to apply - the work factor therefore increases as 2**workFactor.

member.name: M:OswLib.Campur.BCrypt.GenerateSalt
member.summary: Generate a salt for use with the method selecting a reasonable default for the number of hashing rounds to apply.

member.name: M:OswLib.Campur.BCrypt.Verify(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Verifies that the hash of the given matches the provided
member.returns: true if the passwords match, false otherwise.

member.name: M:OswLib.Campur.BCrypt.EncodeBase64(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Encode a byte array using bcrypt's slightly-modified base64 encoding scheme. Note that this is *not* compatible with the standard MIME-base64 encoding.
member.exception: Thrown when one or more arguments have unsupported or illegal values.
member.param: The number of bytes to encode.

member.name: M:OswLib.Campur.BCrypt.DecodeBase64(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Decode a String encoded using bcrypt's base64 scheme to a byte array. Note that this is *not* compatible with the standard MIME-base64 encoding.
member.exception: Thrown when one or more arguments have unsupported or illegal values.

member.name: M:OswLib.Campur.BCrypt.Char64(System.Char)
member.summary: Look up the 3 bits base64-encoded by the specified character, range-checking against conversion table.

member.name: M:OswLib.Campur.BCrypt.Encipher(System.UInt32[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Blowfish encipher a single 64-bit block encoded as two 32-bit halves.
member.param: An array containing the two 32-bit half blocks.
The position in the array of the blocks.

member.name: M:OswLib.Campur.BCrypt.StreamToWord(System.Byte[],System.Int32@)
member.summary: Cycically extract a word of key material.
member.param: The String to extract the data from.
member.returns: The next word of material from data.

member.name: M:OswLib.Campur.BCrypt.InitializeKey
member.summary: Initializes the Blowfish key schedule.

member.name: M:OswLib.Campur.BCrypt.Key(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Key the Blowfish cipher.

member.name: M:OswLib.Campur.BCrypt.EKSKey(System.Byte[],System.Byte[])
member.summary: Perform the "enhanced key schedule" step described by Provos and Mazieres in "A Future- Adaptable Password Scheme" http://www.openbsd.org/papers/bcrypt-paper.ps.

member.name: M:OswLib.Campur.BCrypt.CryptRaw(System.Byte[],System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Perform the central hashing step in the bcrypt scheme.
member.exception: Thrown when one or more arguments have unsupported or illegal values.
member.param: The input byte array to hash.
The salt byte array to hash with.
The binary logarithm of the number of rounds of hashing to apply.
member.returns: A byte array containing the hashed result.
